transcript:
to Boris 
narrative was shown by Hlne. She asked him several questions about his journey and seemed greatly interested in the state of the Prussian army. As soon as he had finished she turned to him with her usual smile. 
"You absolutely must come and see me," she said in a tone that implied that, for certain con- siderations he could not know of, this was ab- solutely necessary. 
"On Tuesday between eight and nine. It will give me great pleasure." 
Boris promised to fulfill her wish and
